title: Make explanation field optional in question creation

requirements.text: Update the AdminQuestionCreate.tsx form to make the explanation textarea field optional instead of required, removing any validation that enforces explanation text presence
acceptanceCriteria: The explanation field in the question creation form is marked as optional
Form validation does not require explanation text to be provided
Questions can be successfully created without providing an explanation
The form UI indicates that explanation is optional (e.g., with '(optional)' label)

requirements.text: Update the Question data type in backend/main.mo to make the explanation field optional by changing its type from Text to ?Text
acceptanceCriteria: The Question type's explanation field is defined as ?Text instead of Text
The backend accepts null/empty explanation values when creating questions
Existing questions with explanations remain unaffected

requirements.text: Update the createQuestion backend endpoint in backend/main.mo to accept optional explanation parameter and store null when no explanation is provided
acceptanceCriteria: The createQuestion endpoint accepts explanation as an optional parameter
Questions are successfully created when explanation is null or empty
The stored question has null explanation when none is provided

requirements.text: Update ResultPage.tsx and TestInterface.tsx to handle questions with null/missing explanations gracefully by hiding the explanation section or displaying a placeholder message when no explanation exists
acceptanceCriteria: Questions without explanations display properly in the result review section
No explanation text is shown when the field is null or empty
The UI remains visually consistent whether explanation exists or not

requirements.text: Update the PDF export utility in frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts to handle questions with null/missing explanations by omitting the explanation row in the question breakdown section when no explanation is provided
acceptanceCriteria: PDF generation succeeds for tests containing questions without explanations
The explanation section is omitted from the PDF for questions with null explanation
PDF layout remains properly formatted when explanations are missing

constraints: Maintain backward compatibility with existing questions that have explanations
Do not modify the single-actor backend architecture
Do not edit immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Changing the question creation workflow beyond explanation optionality
Modifying the question data structure beyond the explanation field
